reviewText: I used this tape while training lactation educators and found it very helpful. It gave new perspectives to our training.

This film is something that may appear to be offensive at first glance, but it is anything but. This film will cause you to think, and evaluate how you percieve others, as well as yourself. It is a tasteful, and honest film that every woman, as well as man, should see. It is a groundbreaking look at something that has been perverted by years of advertising, and inuendos. A great purchase indeed!!!

This is an incredible piece of work.  I've never seen a "documentary" like this one.  It's facinating & very thought provoking, for both men & women, but for women especially.  If you're looking for porn, go somewhere else.  This film is way beyond the physical.  It is deep, thoughtful, funny, sad & will make you think & feel a total range of emotions.  Try it.  You'll love it & you'll want to share it with your friends of all ages & experiences.  It's an "Ahhhh Haaaaa" film worth seeing & sharing.
